name: Day Job (SquirtzMD)
description:
DISCLAIMER!!!

 I may have underestimated how difficult this game is. Also may not have stated clearly enough that building up is crucial for victory.

Your passion for fighting giant monsters doesn't pay the bills, you need a day job. Try to survive this treacherous scheduling conflict!



Created in 48 hours (of being awake) for GMTK 2021

Theme: "Joined together"

Programming/Dev: Gary Gould https://twitter.com/GaryDonGould

Art: Yan "Kern" Gagné http://drowtales.com/ Mary Garren. https://chocolate-rebel.tumblr.com/

Music: Portland.Hortan  https://open.spotify.com/artist/683m1id1nEMhA326glS9Yr?si=4nsj5l6CTF2mNppA5ZVi_Q
